bullets: Developed a causal inference framework using instrumental variables to estimate the true ROI of marketing campaigns, identifying strategies that increased revenue by 15%
Designed and analyzed complex A/B tests for user engagement features, leading to a 10% increase in daily active users
Built a customer churn prediction model using XGBoost that saved the company $2M annually in retained revenue
Presented technical insights to C-suite executives, translating complex statistical concepts into actionable business strategies
Led a research project on high-dimensional genomic data analysis, resulting in 2 publications in top-tier peer-reviewed journals
Developed novel Bayesian statistical models to handle missing data in large-scale longitudinal studies
Mentored 3 PhD students in statistical programming and experimental design

projects.title: CausalImpact Implementation
projects.description: Open-source contribution implementing Google's CausalImpact algorithm in a new domain, downloaded 1,000+ times.
bullets: Implemented Google's CausalImpact algorithm achieving 1,000+ downloads

projects.title: Healthcare Policy Simulation
projects.description: Agent-based simulation model to predict the impact of policy changes on hospital wait times and resource allocation.
bullets: Built agent-based simulation for healthcare policy impact prediction
